content: *dress it up dress it down -- this cute top can go from the beach to the mall to a summer dinner out with equal ease lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 60485 skill level intermediate size small medium large 1x 2x finished measurement below bust 26½ 33½ 40 46½ 53½ in 67 5 85 101 5 118 136 cm finished length 24 24½ 24½ 25½ 25½ in 61 62 62 65 65 cm 830-134 cotton-ease terracotta 4 4 5 6 7 balls crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm gauge 18 double_crochet + 8 row = 4 in 10 cm 7 shells = 8 in 20 cm skirted section below bra is worked in rounds shells finishing sew a button at tip of each bra triangle construction schematics are provided crochet terms are in u s terminology *free registration at lionbrand com required to access pattern *
